Sentencas: Temperature-programmed desorption (TPD) with a carrier gas was used to study the oxygen sorption and desorption properties of oxidation catalysts and solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode materials (La0.85Sr0.15)(0.95)MnO3+ (LSM) and La0.60Sr0.40Fe0.80Mn0.20O3- (LSFM).
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: The powders were characterized by X-ray diffractometry, atomic force microscopy (AFM), and BET surface adsorption.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: Sorbed oxygen could be distinguished from oxygen originating from stoichiometry changes.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: The results indicated that there is one main site for oxygen sorption/desorption.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: The amount of sorbed oxygen was monitored over time at different temperatures.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: Furthermore, through data analysis it was shown that the desorption peak associated with oxygen sorption is described well by second-order desorption kinetics.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: This indicates that oxygen molecules dissociate upon adsorption and that the rate-determining step for the desorption reaction is a recombination of monatomic oxygen.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: Typical problems with re-adsorption in this kind of TPD setup were revealed to be insignificant by using simulations.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites

Sentencas: Finally, different key parameters of sorption and desorption were determined, such as desorption activation energies, density of sorption sites, and adsorption and desorption reaction order.
Titulo: Oxygen Sorption and Desorption Properties of Selected Lanthanum Manganites and Lanthanum Ferrite Manganites
